mapper.select: select ,sii.IDC_NAME as TRANS_IDC_ID,ssr.ROOM_NAME as TRANS_ROOM_IDX from SMMS_DOMAIN_FULX flx left join SMMS_ROOM_INFO as ssr on flx.ROOM_IDX = ssr.ROOM_IDX and flx.IDC_ID = ssr.ACCESS_ID and ssr.RECORDSTATE='0' left join smms_idc_info as sii on flx.IDC_ID = sii.IDC_ID and ssr.RECORDSTATE='0' where flx.RID = #{RID}
